name: GuardianDJ
description:
Instructions:

Drag the record to different sections under the needle to control your character.

Orange- Walk through stop signs

Red- Moonwalk through puddles

Green- Headbang your way through birds

Blue- Shoot giant birds with your gun (the timing is tricky!)

--

Heaven. A place where dreams come true. You brought your record collection to the pearly gates hoping to play music for the angels and Jesus Himself but the job market is saturated. So you take a dead-end desk job to make ends meet but hey, at least you're still a DJ.

You're a Guardian DJ.

You're paid minimum wage to keep your music-loving mortal alive. They actually love music so much that they will ignore their own safety as they groove down the street.

Your job is to keep them alive by scrubbing to different songs on your record.

Special thanks to Bensound for the elevator music!
